# Test for issue #68658: In GOPATH mode, files with a fileVersion earlier
# than go1.21 should downgrade to go1.21, not an earlier language version.

[short] skip 'requires build'

env GO111MODULE=off
go build foo

-- foo/main.go --
//go:build go1.10

package p

import "fmt"

func main() {
	var x any
	fmt.Println(x)
}
